text: la yudkhil alhzn 'iilaa qalbik -ayha alrswl- hwla' alkfar bmsarethm fi aljhwd waldlal, 'iinahum bdhlk lan yaduruu allh, 'iinama yaduruwn 'anfusahum bhrmanha halawat al'iiman wezym althwab, yurid allah 'alaa yajeal lahum thwabana fi alakhrt; li'anahum ansarafuu ean daewatan alhq, walahum eadhab shdyd
